turn_blink_duration.description: How long turn signals should stay on or off when blinking.

emergency_blink_duration.description: How long emergency lights should stay on or off when blinking.

turn_blink_audio_event.description: [string]Audio event to play when blinking turn signals.

emergency_blink_audio_event.description: [string]Audio event to play when blinking emergency lights.

audio_source_node.description: [string]Vehicle node from which to play audio events.

light_info.description: Information about each interactive light on the vehicle.

toot_start_audio_event.description: [string]The audio event to trigger when we begin tooting.

toot_stop_audio_event.description: [string]The audio event to trigger when we stop tooting.
